summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.9°C) and outside temperature (down 1.7°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.4 mm), light levels (up 3102 lux), and cloud levels (up 409 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1344 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5449 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 409.3m lower than yesterday, 953.6m lower than past week, 1344.4m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 860m and a peak of 3110m, averaging 1464.0m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air. A few light raindrops may fall, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
